mapper.select: SELECT cb.id AS id, cb.name AS name, SUM(cbp.score) AS totalScore, 0 as getScore FROM t_challenge_block cb LEFT JOIN t_challenge_block_problem cbp ON cb.id = cbp.block_id GROUP BY cb.id ORDER BY id
SELECT id, name, block_type, description FROM t_challenge_block WHERE id = #{blockId};

SELECT cbc.block_id bid FROM t_challenge_block_condition cbc WHERE cbc.precondition_block_id IN ( SELECT cuob.block_id FROM t_challenge_user_open_block cuob WHERE username=#{username} ) UNION ( SELECT block_id bid FROM t_challenge_user_open_block WHERE username=#{username} ) ORDER BY bid
